Name: Tesseract
Output Formats: Text, hOCR,[2] PDF, others with different user interfaces[3] or the API
Notes: Created by Hewlett-Packard

Name: Readiris
Notes: Owned by Canon

Name: CIB ocr [6]
Languages: German, English, Spanish, Russian, Chinese, Japanese, Italian, French
Notes: CIB ocr supports more than 160 input formats

Name: Screenworm
Notes: Product of Funchip. Uses the Tesseract OCR-engine.

Name: ExperVision[8] TypeReader & RTK
Notes: Has a Mobile and Embedded System version for iOS/Android/etc.

Name: AliusDoc AD-SCI[9]
Output Formats: XML, PlainText, any other thru SDK extensions
Notes: Minimal need for post-sale Professional Services. Works with structured, semi-structured, and unstructured documents.

Name: ABBYY FineReader
Output Formats: DOC, DOCX, XLS, XLSX, PPTX, RTF, PDF, HTML, CSV, TXT, ODT, DjVu, EPUB, FB2[11]
Notes: ABBYY also supplies SDKs for embedded and mobile devices. Professional, Corporate and Site License Editions for Windows, Express Edition for Mac.[12]

Name: Asprise OCR SDK
Notes: Java, C#, VB.NET, C/C++/Delphi SDKs for OCR and Barcode recognition on Windows, Linux, Mac OS X and Unix.[15]

Name: Nicomsoft OCR SDK
Notes: C#, VB.NET, C++, Delphi, Java OCR tool for Windows and Linux.[17]

Name: AnyDoc Software
Notes: Works with structured, semi-structured, and unstructured documents.

Name: LEADTOOLS[18]
Output Formats: PDF, PDF/A, DOC, DOCX, XLS, XPS, RTF, HTML, ANSI Text, Unicode Text, CSV[21]
Notes: Supports Latin, Asian, Arabic, and MICR character sets.[18] For full page, zonal, and form image processing. Includes OCR, barcode, OMR and forms recognition.[22] ICR (handwritten text recognition) is supported.[23]

Name: CuneiForm
Output Formats: HTML, hOCR, native, RTF, TeX, TXT[24]
Notes: Enterprise-class system, can save text formatting and recognizes complicated tables of any structure

Name: OCR.space
Notes: Windows desktop software, Windows Store application and online web app - converts scanned documents to editable text documents using OCR.

Name: OmniPage
Output Formats: DOC/DOCX XLS/XLSX PPTX RTF PDF PDF/A Searchable PDF HTML Text XML ePUB MP3
Notes: Product of Nuance Communications

Name: gImageReader[29]
Notes: uses Tesseract OCR engine

Name: Ocrad
Notes: Command line

Name: SmartScore
Notes: For musical scores

Name: Microsoft Office Document Imaging
Notes: Uses OmniPage[citation needed]

Name: OCR.net
Notes: Online service powered by PDF OCR X for conversions.

Name: PDF OCR X
Notes: Drag and drop UI.

Name: Puma.NET
Notes: .NET OCR SDK based on Cognitive Technologies' CuneiForm recognition engine. Wraps Puma COM server and provides simplified API for .NET applications

Name: ReadSoft
Notes: Scan, capture and classify business documents such as invoices, forms and purchase orders integrated with business processes.

Name: Scantron
Notes: For working with localized interfaces, corresponding language support is required.

Name: OCRFeeder
Notes: Features a full user interface and has a command-line tool for automatic operations. Has its own segmentation algorithm but uses system-wide OCR engines like Tesseract or Ocrad

Name: OCRopus
Languages: All languages using Latin script (other languages can be trained)
Fonts: Normal Latin script and Fraktur (other scripts can be trained)
Notes: Pluggable framework under active development, used for Google Books

Name: MathOCR
Notes: Features mathematical formula recognition and logical layout analysis, can use OCR engines like Tesseract or Ocrad as back-end.

Name: MeOCR
Output Formats: HTML, hOCR, native, RTF, TeX, TXT
Notes: Windows application. Converts scanned documents to editable text documents using OCR and exports them to Microsoft Word with one click. Features a full user interface and also has a .NET Interface library[35] for developers.

Name: Yunmai OCR SDK
Programming language: Java, C++, C, object pascal, objective-C
Notes: Has the advantage of Chinese characters recognition.[36]

Name: Anyline SDK
Programming language: Java (Android), Objective-C & Swift (iOS), C# (Windows Phone, Xamarin), JavaScript (Cordova)[40]
Notes: *Customizable mobile OCR SDK for Android, iOS, Windows Phone, Smart glasses (Google Glass, Epson Moverio,...)
